title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.

OB: <Add observed behavior here>

EB: Upon the second attempt, the label item can be selected successfully.

SR: 
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.
4. Note the inability to select the item on the first attempt.
5. Repeat the selection attempt.
6. Observe that the label item can now be selected.
